document.full_text: north korea delivered a stinging rejection of the south's proposal for a series of three presidential summits over the next year, giving a blow-by-blow account on wednesday of a secret meeting between officials of the two countries last month.
document.title: north korea rejects secret offer of south summit
lines_and_colors: north korea delivered a stinging rejection of the south's proposal for a series of three presidential summits over the next year, giving a blow-by-blow account on wednesday of a secret meeting between officials of the two countries last month.
